text: John Bernard O'Reilly Jr. (September 21, 1948 â€“ January 1, 2025) was an American politician. He was the 6th mayor of Dearborn, Michigan from 2007 to 2022. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was a member of the Dearborn City Council from 1990 to 2007. O'Reilly died on January 1, 2025, at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:People from Dearborn, Michigan Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: John B. O'Reilly Jr.
